headline: Hypotenuse AI (YC S20) — we’re hiring!
summary: f(Q,K,V) = softmax(QK^T/√d_k)V is all you need.

experiences.title: Co-founder & CEO
experiences.description:
Hypotenuse AI creates unique copywriting and visual content for you within seconds using AI. Get blog articles, product descriptions, advertising captions and pictures or artwork just by providing a few keywords.

Backed by top investors including Y Combinator and other VCs/strategic angels.

experiences.title: Applied Research Scientist (Machine Learning)
experiences.description:
Applied Scientist working on machine learning research for Amazon AI (Alexa). 

First author publications for papers in language generation, information extraction and building knowledge graphs. 

Research was focused on multimodal neural networks for computer vision and NLP, including the application of transformer-based models (BERT, GPT) to information extraction, natural language understanding, knowledge graphs and natural language generation.
experiences.location: Palo Alto, California, United States | United Kingdom

experiences.title: Supervisor
experiences.description: Invited back as an alumni to supervise the computer vision, artificial intelligence and e-commerce courses. Also supervisor for Part II dissertations (ML & Deep learning areas).

experiences.title: Business Development & Analytics
experiences.description:
Shop Online, Earn Cashback!

ShopBack is a leading platform for ecommerce discovery and loyalty. We offer consumers real cash rebates on online purchases, focusing on consumers in the USA and Asia-Pacific regions. With over 500 online partner stores including Apple, Groupon, Expedia and many more, ShopBack is spearheading changes in the way people shop online, and helping millions save on their purchases.

Responsible for hiring, data analytics and business development.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Natural Language Processing and Generation for the Alexa Team

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description: A mobile and web platform which makes use of data analytics and machine learning to bring personalised education to all students. Through our simple and intuitive software, we are able to give students personalised practice questions, ensuring efficient studying on exactly what they need.

experiences.title: Business Development
experiences.description:
Investment Vehicule set up by serial entrepreneurs investing exclusively in serial entrepreneurs based in New York, Silicon Valley, Beijing, Singapore, Hong Kong, Berlin and Stockholm within Payments/Fintech and Digital Media.

http://www.trueglobalventures.com/

Responsible for:
- Sourcing, reaching out to and negotiating with partners from Silicon Valley, SG and HK
- Event organisation and Assisting portfolio companies
- Full responsibility for sourcing, initial valuation and PR for projects
Including "Female Entrepreneur" and "Tesla Innovation" projects

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Palantir Prize
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: For final year dissertation on Deep Neural Architectures for Visual Question Answering

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Bloomberg Better Future Prize

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Best Speaker
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Best Talk in the Practice of Computer Science for talk on "Speech Recognition using Hidden Markov Models"

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: OBA Silver Medal
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Second Highest Overall Achievement in the school

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Top Student Voted Prize on Product Design
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Project on tackling recycling and trash with data analytics

accomplishment_projects.title: Neural Architectures for Visual Question Answering
Adaptive Learning Chatbot
accomplishment_projects.description:
A learning buddy which provides practice questions for students preparing for exams. Makes use of a probabilistic scoring system and adapts to each student's responses to allow for personalised content - all in the form of a friendly chatbot with a sense of humour.

Built on Android and with Microsoft Azure's Bot Framework.

accomplishment_projects.title: The Right Way
accomplishment_projects.description:
A GPS Glove for cyclists: uses vibration motors on the tips of each finger to signal which direction to go next (eg right most finger = turn right, middle finger = cont. straight), paired via Bluetooth with an Android App using the Google Maps API. Built with BBC microbit and Android.

2nd Runner-Up in the Cambridge ARM Hackathon

accomplishment_projects.title: Intelligent Social Assistant
accomplishment_projects.description:
Trained Neural Networks to be able to identify and anticipate forum users who are in situations of social need, such as risks of depression and suicidal thoughts. Forum posts were dynamically scraped to produce large enough datasets for training, and bootstrapping was used for expanding our labelled dataset. Implemented with TensorFlow and BeautifulSoup.

Winner of Bloomberg's Better Future Prize

accomplishment_projects.title: Algorithmic Trading
accomplishment_projects.description:
Designed and developed software in C++ which connected to the Cambridge University Engineering Department servers and traded shares. Past data trends were provided to us and the program needed to predict and trade shares to maximize profits. Used linear regression models as part of the algorithm and created a GUI to display statistics and real-time data.

Achieved second highest profits

accomplishment_projects.title: Braille Reader
accomplishment_projects.description:
Built a 3D scanner using sensor/motorized hardware and Matlab which read Braille and converted it to English

Top 3 groups in initial presentation

accomplishment_projects.title: Go Cashless, Go Trashless
accomplishment_projects.description:
Designed a smart bin solution to the problem of waste and recycling, which made use of purchasing data and analytics to allow for automated trash sorting. 

Top student voted prize for product design

accomplishment_projects.title: Vote Counter
accomplishment_projects.description: Created a desktop application in C++ for the Students' Council elections for automated computing of votes per candidate.
